meanings: (약품) medicine, drug, medication, remedy, cure, (환약) pill, (정제) tablet
[…미달] a little less than [short of], a little under.

vlive.english: Show you how I take my pill?

vlive.english: but I'm taking 3 different kinds. - Multivitamin?
